tasks.title: Visit ClickForCharity Nostr Post
tasks.description: Help boost our Nostr presence by visiting and engaging with our latest post.
instructions: Click the button to open our Nostr post
Like or repost if you have an account
Click any links to ClickForCharity if available

tasks.title: Google Search for ClickForCharity
tasks.description: Help improve our search rankings by searching and visiting our site through Google.
instructions: Click the button to open Google search
Find and click on clickforcharity.net in results
Browse our site for at least 60 seconds
Visit the 'How it Works' page if possible

tasks.title: Support Lightning.news Partner
tasks.description: Visit our media partner Lightning.news and help support their content.
instructions: Click the button to visit Lightning.news
Read at least one full article
Share on social media if you can
Look for any ClickForCharity mentions or links

tasks.title: Explore ClickForCharity Website
tasks.description: Take a tour of our main website and learn about our mission.
instructions: Click the button to visit ClickForCharity.net
